Decision

We provide you with

  • Insights to current and future market dynamics along with precise scenarios to integrate, validate or challenge your own market assumptions.
  • Clear, actionable market levels and timing.
  • Tactical opportunities to assist with the diversification or hedging of portfolios.
  • Full availability of dedicated expert consultants.

Trading

We provide you with

  • Daily directions and precise key levels of inflexion on your markets.
  • Optimization of your execution timing through our real-time updates and intraday reactivity.
  • Continuous and coherent focus on daily market dynamics within a larger weekly scenario.
  • Full availability of dedicated expert consultants.

Risk

We provide you with

  • Ongoing coverage delivering continuous updates and risk evaluation.
  • Risk assessments through detailed analysis of alternative scenarios.
  • Correlated market levels within and across asset classes.
  • Full availability of dedicated expert consultants.
